name: A mask of the witch goddess, Rangda
data: It increases the users wisdom a tiny bit.
It increases the users intelligence a tiny bit.
It has pathetic armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'nerve mastery'.
The mask strikes terror in the hearts of onlookers, making them
